alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 11:56PM CDT until May 18 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cowley County in south central Kansas... Sedgwick County in south central Kansas... Southwestern Butler County in south central Kansas... Northern Sumner County in south central Kansas... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1156 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Haysville, moving southeast at 30 mph. There will be little to no rain with this wind. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Andover, Haysville, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Rose Hill, Maize, Clearwater, Cheney, Douglass, Belle Plaine, Conway Springs, Benton, Garden Plain, Downtown Wichita and Kechi. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 15. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 26 and 61. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
